statements: UPDATE wine_tasting_tours SET itinerary = 'Updated itinerary for Tour A' WHERE tour_id = 1;

UPDATE destinations SET destination_name = 'New York' WHERE destination_id = 1;
UPDATE wine_tours SET participant_count = 20, tour_guide_name = 'Alice' WHERE tour_id = 2;
